languages.text: {n}Фигура {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}техножреца{/g}, завернутая в замызганную красную мантию, бугрится скрытыми механизмами, встроенными в человеческое тело. Лицо под допотопным {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}имплантом{/g}-респиратором выглядит изможденным и нездоровым.{/n} "И... И..." {n}Щелчок, лязг, едва слышное шипение — и только после этого {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}вокс{/g} техножреца заканчивает слово:{/n} "Идентификация".

traits.locale_text: {n}Фигура техножреца под замызганной красной мантией бугрится скрытыми механизмами, встроенными в человеческое тело. Воздух мира-фабрики заполнен вонью гари и стали, однако вблизи вы отчетливо ощущаете источаемый человеком смрад — убийственную смесь технической смазки, застарелого пота и чего-то еще более отвратительного.{/n}

languages.text: {n}The lumps protruding under the {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}Tech-Priest{/g}'s bedraggled red robe hint at the mechanisms implanted in his body. You see his haggard and sickly face under the archaic respirator {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}augmetic{/g}.{/n} "I... I..." {n}A click, a clank, a barely audible hiss — and only then the Tech-Priest's {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}vox{/g} finishes the word,{/n} "Identification."
languages.original_text: {n}Фигура {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}техножреца{/g}, завернутая в замызганную красную мантию, бугрится скрытыми механизмами, встроенными в человеческое тело. Лицо под допотопным {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}имплантом{/g}-респиратором выглядит изможденным и нездоровым.{/n} "И... И..." {n}Щелчок, лязг, едва слышное шипение — и только после этого {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}вокс{/g} техножреца заканчивает слово:{/n} "Идентификация".

traits.locale_text: {n}The lumps all over the Tech-Priest's figure, wrapped in a bedraggled red robe, hint at hidden mechanisms implanted in his body. You see his face under the archaic respirator implant — haggard and sickly.{/n} "I... I..." {n}A click, a clank, a barely audible hiss — and only then the Tech-Priest's vox finishes the word,{/n} "Identification."

You see his face under the archaic respirator implant — haggard and sickly.{/n} "I... I..." {n}A click, a clank, a barely audible hiss — and only then the Tech-Priest's vox finishes the word,{/n} "Identification."

I..." {n}A click, a clank, a barely audible hiss — and only then the Tech-Priest's {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}vox{/g} finishes the word,{/n} "Identification."

{n}The lumps protruding under the {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}Tech-Priest{/g}'s bedraggled red robe hint at the mechanisms implanted in his body. You see his haggard and sickly face under the archaic respirator {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}augmetic{/g}.{/n} "I... I..." {n}A click, a clank, a barely audible hiss — and only then the Tech-Priest's {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}vox{/g} finishes the word,{/n} "Identification."

languages.text: {n}这位{g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}技术神甫{/g}破旧的红袍之下有一大块肿块，应该是有什么东西被植入了他的体内。你看到古老的呼吸器{g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}植入物{/g}之下，他的面孔充满了憔悴与病态。{/n}“我……我……”{n}随后，你听到了咔嚓与叮叮当当的响声，以及几乎难以察觉的嘶嘶声。在这之后，这位技术神甫的{g|Encyclopedia:Vox}音阵{/g}系统才说完这句话。{/n}“报出你的身份。”
languages.original_text: {n}The lumps protruding under the {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}Tech-Priest{/g}'s bedraggled red robe hint at the mechanisms implanted in his body. You see his haggard and sickly face under the archaic respirator {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}augmetic{/g}.{/n} "I... I..." {n}A click, a clank, a barely audible hiss — and only then the Tech-Priest's {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}vox{/g} finishes the word,{/n} "Identification."

traits.locale_text: {n}这位{g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}技术祭司{/g}破旧的红袍之下有一大块肿块，应该是有什么东西被植入了他的体内。你看到古老的呼吸器{g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}植入物{/g}之下，他的面孔充满了憔悴与病态。{/n}“我……我……”{n}随后，你听到了咔嚓与叮叮当当的响声，以及几乎难以察觉的嘶嘶声。在这之后，这位技术祭司的{g|Encyclopedia:Vox}音阵{/g}系统才说完这句话。{/n}“报出你的身份。”

languages.text: {n}Los bultos que ves bajo la ajada túnica roja del {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}tecnosacerdote{/g} señalan los implantes de su cuerpo. Ves su cara, enjuta y enfermiza, bajo un arcaico {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}aumético{/g} de respiración.{/n} «I... I...». {n}Oyes un chasquido, un rechinar y un siseo mudo hasta que por fin el {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}voco{/g} del tecnosacerdote termina la palabra:{/n} «Identificación».
languages.original_text: {n}The lumps protruding under the {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}Tech-Priest{/g}'s bedraggled red robe hint at the mechanisms implanted in his body. You see his haggard and sickly face under the archaic respirator {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}augmetic{/g}.{/n} "I... I..." {n}A click, a clank, a barely audible hiss — and only then the Tech-Priest's {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}vox{/g} finishes the word,{/n} "Identification."

traits.locale_text: {n}Los bultos que ves bajo la ajada túnica roja del {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}tecnosacerdote{/g} señalan los implantes de su cuerpo. Ves su cara, enjuta y enfermiza, bajo un arcaico {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}aumético{/g} de respiración.{/n} «I... I...». {n}Oyes un chasquido, un rechinar y un siseo mudo hasta que por fin el {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}voco{/g} del tecnosacerdote termina la palabra:{/n} «Identificación».

languages.text: {n}{g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}技術司祭{/g}の汚れた赤いローブの下から突き出す塊は、体に埋め込まれた機械であろうと何となくわかった。古代の呼吸装置{g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}オーグメティック{/g}の下から、病人のようなやつれた顔が覗く。{/n}「わ…私は…」{n}カチッ、ガチャガチャ、かろうじてヒューヒューと聞こえる声…そしてようやく、技術司祭の{g|Encyclopedia:Vox}ヴォクス{/g}は一言発して終了した。{/n}「確認」
languages.original_text: {n}The lumps protruding under the {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}Tech-Priest{/g}'s bedraggled red robe hint at the mechanisms implanted in his body. You see his haggard and sickly face under the archaic respirator {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}augmetic{/g}.{/n} "I... I..." {n}A click, a clank, a barely audible hiss — and only then the Tech-Priest's {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}vox{/g} finishes the word,{/n} "Identification."

traits.locale_text: {n}{g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}技術司祭{/g}の汚れた赤いローブの下から突き出す塊は、体に埋め込まれた機械であろうと何となくわかった。古代の呼吸装置{g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}オーグメティック{/g}の下から、病人のようなやつれた顔が覗く。{/n}「わ…私は…」{n}カチッ、ガチャガチャ、かろうじてヒューヒューと聞こえる声…そしてようやく、技術司祭の{g|Encyclopedia:Vox}ヴォクス{/g}は一言発して終了した。{/n}「確認」

languages.text: {n}Die Beulen unter der heruntergekommenen roten Robe des {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}Techpriesters{/g} deuten auf die in seinem Körper implantierten Mechanismen hin. Unter der veralteten Atemgerät-{g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}Augmentation{/g} siehst du sein hageres und kränkliches Gesicht.{/n} "I... i..." {n}Ein Klicken, ein Klappern, ein kaum hörbares Zischen – und erst dann beendet das {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}Vox{/g} des Techpriesters das Wort:{/n} "Identifikation."
languages.original_text: {n}The lumps protruding under the {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}Tech-Priest{/g}'s bedraggled red robe hint at the mechanisms implanted in his body. You see his haggard and sickly face under the archaic respirator {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}augmetic{/g}.{/n} "I... I..." {n}A click, a clank, a barely audible hiss — and only then the Tech-Priest's {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}vox{/g} finishes the word,{/n} "Identification."

traits.locale_text: {n}Die Beulen unter der heruntergekommenen roten Robe des {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}Techpriesters{/g} deuten auf die in seinem Körper implantierten Mechanismen hin. Unter der veralteten Atemgerät-{g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}Augmentation{/g} siehst du sein hageres und kränkliches Gesicht.{/n} "I... i..." {n}Ein Klicken, ein Klappern, ein kaum hörbares Zischen – und erst dann beendet das {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}Vox{/g} des Techpriesters das Wort:{/n} "Identifikation."

languages.text: {n}Les protubérances que vous devinez sous la robe rouge décrépite du {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}technoprêtre{/g} en disent long sur les mécanismes implantés dans son corps, et vous distinguez son visage hâve et hagard sous l'{g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}augmétique{/g} archaïque qui lui sert de respirateur.{/n} « Je... Je... » {n}Le {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}vox{/g} du technoprêtre émet un cliquetis, suivi d'un claquement métallique et d'un sifflement à peine audible avant d'ajouter,{/n} « Identifiez-vous. »
languages.original_text: {n}The lumps protruding under the {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}Tech-Priest{/g}'s bedraggled red robe hint at the mechanisms implanted in his body. You see his haggard and sickly face under the archaic respirator {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}augmetic{/g}.{/n} "I... I..." {n}A click, a clank, a barely audible hiss — and only then the Tech-Priest's {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}vox{/g} finishes the word,{/n} "Identification."

traits.locale_text: {n}Les protubérances que vous devinez sous la robe rouge décrépite du {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}technoprêtre{/g} en disent long sur les mécanismes implantés dans son corps, et vous distinguez son visage hâve et hagard sous l'{g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}augmétique{/g} archaïque qui lui sert de respirateur.{/n} « Je... Je... » {n}Le {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}vox{/g} du technoprêtre émet un cliquetis, suivi d'un claquement métallique et d'un sifflement à peine audible avant d'ajouter,{/n} « Identifiez-vous. »

languages.text: {n}{g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}Tekno Rahip'in{/g} yıpranmış kırmızı cübbesinin altında çıkıntı yapan yumrular, vücuduna mekanizmalar yerleştirildiğini işaret ediyor. İlkel solunum cihazı {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}ogmetiğinin{/g} ardında bitkin ve hastalıklı bir yüz görüyorsun.{/n} "Kim... Kim..." {n}Tekno Rahip'in {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}voksu{/g}; bir tıklama, bir tınlama ve zar zor duyulan bir tıslamanın ardından kelimeyi ancak bitirebiliyor.{/n} "Kimlik."
languages.original_text: {n}The lumps protruding under the {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}Tech-Priest{/g}'s bedraggled red robe hint at the mechanisms implanted in his body. You see his haggard and sickly face under the archaic respirator {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}augmetic{/g}.{/n} "I... I..." {n}A click, a clank, a barely audible hiss — and only then the Tech-Priest's {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}vox{/g} finishes the word,{/n} "Identification."

traits.locale_text: {n}{g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}Tekno Rahip{/g}'in yıpranmış kırmızı cübbesinin altında çıkıntı yapan yumrular, vücuduna yerleştirilen mekanizmalar olduğuna işaret ediyor. İlkel solunum cihazı {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}ogmetiği{/g}nin ardında bitkin ve hastalıklı bir yüz görüyorsun.{/n} "Kim... Kim..." {n}Tekno Rahip ancak bir tıklama, bir tınlama ve zar zor duyulan bir tıslama ardından bitirebiliyor kelimeyi {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}voks{/g}unu kullanarak.{/n} "Kimlik."
